attributes.action: Give the RNLI a monthly wage
attributes.background:
The RNLI risk there life's on a daily basis to save others as do paramedics/fireman.
The fireman/paramedics earn a regular salary it's about time the RNLI did as they're part of the emergency services

rejection.details:
The RNLI is a charity and not a Government funded service.

You may be interested to see this related petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/158527

A petition which called for legislation to establish a state-funded lifeboat service, with salaried crew, would be more likely to meet the rules for petitions.
